Introduction
This topic contains information on claims for the special allowance under 38 U.S.C. 1312(a), including
accepting claims for the special allowance
, and
handling the receipt of
VA Form 21-4182
,
Application for Dependency and Indemnity Compensation or Death Pension (Including Accrued Benefits and Death Compensation Where Applicable)
.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Eligibility Determinations and Claims for the Special Allowance Under 38 U.S.C. 1312(a)
citation: Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B
